name: refrigeratorMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the mode of the refrigerator.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the refrigerator's mode.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to which the refrigerator should be changed (e.g., fruit/vegetable, wine, meat, defrost).

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: The weight of the item being placed in the refrigerator compartment.

parameters.name: weightUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the weight (e.g., kg, lbs).
